review_title: Seeing the fruits of your labour is the best reward
pros: You are given lots of autonomy, flexibility, and respect. No one micromanages you, you are accountable to your students first and foremost. Although, you are also expected to meet general deadlines set by management. Watching students succeed is an amazing feeling. Always look forward to graduation ceremonies.
cons: There is not a lot of room for upwards growth. There is no sick pay. Management is very reasonable though with days off, as long as you get the work done. You are not allowed to work vacation days and there is no compensation. There is no pay advance, no matter how long you work here.
